Description: A flavorful muffin with blueberries, yogurt and honey.
Spicy single-origin Sumatran cinnamon is swirled around a flaky, buttery pastry.
Each bite of this buttery scone showcases tangy cranberries and tart orange zest that are perfectly balanced with a ribbon of tangy-sweet cranberry spread.
A flaky pastry folded around reduced-fat cream cheese.
This summer treat starts with a slightly crunchy graham crust, then a layer of milk chocolate and finally it's piled high with lightly-toasted marshmallows.
Cake is dipped in white chocolatey flavored coating and sweetly decorated.
A classic brownie made with premium chocolate and cocoa.
This crispy, chewy marshmallow bar is made of ooey gooey soft marshmallows, crispy rice and pure butter to create a sweet treat.
Applewood smoked bacon, melty aged Gouda and a parmesan frittata are layered on an artisan roll.
A rich, almond flan is enveloped in a flaky, buttery croissant, then topped with sliced almonds. It's the perfect combination of sweet and savory.
A gently spiced bread with pumpkin flavors and pepitas.
A traditional cake with cinnamon and brown sugar.
Roasted tomatoes, mozzarella, spinach and basil pesto toasted focaccia.
A moist lemon cake with sweet icing.
Crunchy pecans, brown sugar and honey all in a buttery crust create the perfect balance in this nutty, sweet treat.
A chewy cookie with rolled oats, raisins and dried apricots.
